title: Tang China and the Silk Road
description: Networks of trade and cultural exchange connected Tang-dynasty China (618-907) with major cities between the Mediterranean coast and Japan. Exhibited are burial, religious, and luxury objects displaying cross-cultural perspectives.
short_description: Networks of trade and cultural exchange connected Tang-dynasty China (618-907) with major cities between the Mediterranean coast and Japan. Exhibited are burial, religious, and luxury objects displaying cross-cultural perspectives.

input: Tang China and the Silk Road
